duties_responsibilities.duty: Close sales and win new business within a defined territory.
Attend and complete award-winning training program and join a sales team to sell human resources solutions.
Cultivate relationships with Human Resources and executive decision-makers, set appointments, gather leads, and assess buyer needs.
Manage multiple sales processes at the same time and stick with the process through implementation.
Strategically cross-sell with other ADP associates to cultivate additional business within existing accounts.
Serve as a trusted advisor, partner, and ADP ambassador while demonstrating grace under pressure and the highest ethical standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field
